Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web. Learn more about using Distill at https://rstudio.github.io/distill. This html file provides choropleth maps based on the percentage of Lawrence alumnis who accepted jobs/researches in various states around the US. Data has been collected by the Career Center, Lawrence University. The maps are interactive - hover over them to reveal the name of the state and the percentage of Lawrence alums working there. The top 5 majors based on data are as follows: Biology - 309 Students Psychology - 250 Students Economics - 233 Students English - 203 Students Government - 184 Students Lawrence Alumnis who majored in Biology (Map of 309 Students) The graph below shows the percentage of Lawrence alumni working around the United States who had majored in Biology during their time at Lawrence. The maps are interactive - hover over them to reveal the name of the state and the percentage of Lawrence alums working there.
